snippet: Robert A. Pastor, an influential scholar and policymaker who spent decades working for better inter-American relations and democracy and free elections in the Western Hemisphere, has died after a three-year battle with cancer. He was 66....

headline.print_headline: Robert Pastor: Ex-US Official, Americas Expert
headline.main: Robert Pastor: Ex-US Official, Americas Expert

lead_paragraph: Robert A. Pastor, an influential scholar and policymaker who spent decades working for better inter-American relations and democracy and free elections in the Western Hemisphere, has died after a three-year battle with cancer. He was 66.
